name: Spike Wonderland
description:
A fast_paced 2Dplatformer that makes you want to smash your setup into Pieces..... your only objective is to reach to point B from point A. and guess what! you are a square... and that is about!

short but hopefully fun little game. hope you enjoy it...

A game by: Arshiya Khebredast

if your looking for a relaxing and calm experience your at the wrong place this creation will make your temper feel short...

good luck ever finishing it!!!
